title: Bangladesh MP Tamanna Nusrat Hires 8 Lookalikes To Take Exam Instead Of Her, Gets Expelled
text:
Have you ever been so unprepared for exams that you thought, 'let me hire some lookalikes who can take the exam instead of me'? Even if you did, you probably did not go through with the idea. But this Bangladeshi politician did. She allegedly hired as many as eight lookalikes, to take the exam instead of her.

Unfortunately (for her), the authorities found out and she was expelled from the university. Tamanna Nusrat, who is from the ruling party - Awami League Party - has been accused of paying her lookalikes to take 13 tests for her.

The cat leapt out of the bag when a private broadcaster from Nagorik TV entered the test hall and confronted one of the women who was posing as Nusrat. She was elected to the parliament last year and was studying with Bangladesh Open University for the degree of Bachelor of Arts.

Lookalike - Bhaskar/Tamanna Nusrat - Facebook

“We expelled her because she has committed a crime. A crime is a crime,” said the BOU head, MA Mannan. “We have cancelled her enrollment. She will never be able to get admitted here again.”

A college official also said, “The proxy students were protected by the MP’s muscle men when they sat for the tests. Everybody knew it but nobody uttered a word because she is from a very influential family.”

Test frauds, cheating is not so uncommon in Bangladesh, or even India! The good thing is, the authorities did not shy away from taking a stand just because she was a politician. Kudos to them for being brave and doing their duty diligently.
description: Have you ever been so unprepared for exams that you thought let’s hire some lookalikes who can give your exam? Sigh, nothing like that ever happened though! But this Bangladeshi politician allegedly hired as many as eight lookalikes to give her exam.
